name: Spatium Wars
description:
Welcome to the Spatium World where you take an infinite fight against every intergalactic species

Game features :

  • Upgrade and configure 12 customizable spaceships.
  • Collect many types of items .
  • Trade packs at the Spatium Store and buy & sell items to get money to upgrade your spaceship.
  • Play against more than 200 alien species.
  • The game will adapt to you , the stronger you get ,the more challenging it gets.
  • the more aggressively you play , the more stamina points you get, once stamina is full unleash your superWeapon and exterminate all the invaders.

Game SoundTracks :
